abstract: Driss Diaeddinn of Phoenix shoots and kills four family members, before taking his own life, following an apparent business dispute between Diaeddinn and his two brothers.
lead_paragraph: A man who had been in a business dispute with his two brothers shot and killed them, his mother and one of their wives before taking his own life, the Phoenix police said.

headline.main: Arizona: Business Feud Cited in Killings
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Business Feud Cited in Killings

snippet: A man who had been in a business dispute with his two brothers shot and killed them, his mother and one of their wives before taking his own life, the Phoenix police said.
